dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, have you seen the latest Forbes ranking for Kazakhstan's e-commerce?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, have you seen the latest Forbes ranking for Kazakhstan's e-commerce?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, the "TOP KZ Retail E-Commerce 2021," right? Kaspi.kz taking the top spot *again*.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, the T O P K Z Retail E-Commerce twenty twenty one, right? Kaspi.kz taking the top spot again.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For the fourth year in a row Kaspi.kz has taken first place in the ranking of Kazakhstans largest e-commerce platforms: TOP KZ Retail E-Commerce 2021.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! For the fourth year in a row, which is, uh, pretty incredible, if you ask me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! For the fourth year in a row, which is, uh, pretty incredible, if you ask me.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For the fourth year in a row Kaspi.kz has taken first place in the ranking of Kazakhstans largest e-commerce platforms: TOP KZ Retail E-Commerce 2021.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, Mikhail Lomtadze, the CEO, he must be thrilled. They've got like, over ten million Kazakhstanis using their Super App now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, Mikhail Lomtadze, the C E O, he must be thrilled. They've got like, over ten million Kazakhstanis using their Super App now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Already more than 10 million Kazakhstanis use Kaspi.kzs leading Super App.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Ten million! And they're offering, uh, more than a million products too. He was thanking all their clients and partners, you know.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ten million! And they're offering, uh, more than a million products too. He was thanking all their clients and partners, you know.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We now offer more than 1 million products and our team is continually developing new innovative e-commerce services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right. And the numbers are just wild. Their 2020 e-commerce GMV was $915 million. That's *six times* higher than Wildberries, the number two player. [interrupts] Like, wow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. And the numbers are just wild. Their twenty twenty e-commerce G M V was nine hundred fifteen million dollars. That's six times higher than Wildberries, the number two player. Like, wow.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to published ranking, Kaspi.kzs 2020 e-commerce GMV of $915 million, was more than 6x higher than # 2 e-commerce player, Wildberries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Six times, yeah. But it's not just Kaspi doing well. The whole e-commerce market in Kazakhstan, uh, grew by 116% in the first half of 2021.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Six times, yeah. But it's not just Kaspi doing well. The whole e-commerce market in Kazakhstan, uh, grew by one hundred sixteen percent in the first half of twenty twenty one.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to a study conducted by PwC and the Digital Kazakhstan Association, the e-commerce market in Kazakhstan grew by 116% in the first half of 2021 to 426 billion tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's huge! I think it really speaks to, like, the power of marketplaces, don't you think?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's huge! I think it really speaks to, like, the power of marketplaces, don't you think?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. The article points out how buyers are clearly opting for them. You get that wide range of goods from different merchants.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. The article points out how buyers are clearly opting for them. You get that wide range of goods from different merchants.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the same time, buyers are clearly opting for marketplaces, that enable them to purchase goods from a wide range of merchants.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And it's a massive win for small and medium-sized businesses too. They get access to new tech, online sales channels, a huge customer base...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's a massive win for small and medium-sized businesses too. They get access to new tech, online sales channels, a huge customer base...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Connecting to marketplaces gives small and medium-sized businesses access to the latest technology, new online sales channels, a large customer base, delivery and advertising services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Kaspi, uh, seems to be really driving that growth, not just for themselves but for all those partners, contributing to Kazakhstan's economy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Kaspi, uh, seems to be really driving that growth, not just for themselves but for all those partners, contributing to Kazakhstan's economy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Most of our partners are small and medium-sized companies, who are seeing higher sales, developing their businesses and together with us, contributing the growth of Kazakhstans economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's a pretty strong model they've built there. [interrupts] They're really dominating, uh, the digital landscape.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's a pretty strong model they've built there. They're really dominating, uh, the digital landscape.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. It'll be interesting to see if anyone can even come close next year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. It'll be interesting to see if anyone can even come close next year.
